name: A Gift
Lore: '''As a token of my good will, I present to you a gift: these two droids. Both are hardworking and will serve you well.''',
Text: 'If you just moved a droid to Audience Chamber, deploy on the droid. Droid is an Undercover spy. Wherever opponent has an alien, opponent''s battle destiny draws are -2 and Force drains are -1. Immediate Effect canceled if droid leaves Tatooine. (Immune to Control.)',
